Job Description About the roleAre you an Events Professional who has a background with tech trade shows, conferences, events, and more? If you’re a seasoned Events Manager with a passion for driving success, then read on! We are looking for a talented and creative Events Manager who will support customer and partner success through the design and delivery of extraordinary Arm events. You will bring both strategic and detail oriented execution skills to drive events.What will I be accountable for?The position reports to the IoT Events Manager/Team Lead. The position has working relationships with, but not limited: Worldwide Event Team, Corporate Marketing, Accounting, Legal, Finance, Engineering, IT, as well as service providersResponsible for leading and implementing events and multifaceted projects including industry trade shows, special events, and conferencesExtensive knowledge in trade show project management is critical; from strategy, messaging, design, logistics, vendor management, budget, execution to post-event analysisEvent Manager will be expected to chip in to the strategic development by identifying, presenting and working in support of internal partners program objectives and evaluate results against goals with recommendations for improvementEvaluate event performance, including lead and return on investment tracking and deliver wrap-up reportsLead teams, suppliers and contributors through effective project management & collaboration to extraordinary levels of execution of all assigned deliverables – on schedule and within budget Job Requirements What skills, experience and qualifications do I need?BS/BA in Marketing, Communications, or related field6-8+ years of high tech global marketing and events management and operationsExtraordinary social skills; experience developing working relationships with internal partners, third party vendors, and customersAbility to interface seamlessly with a global, multicultural team (excellent collaboration skills, culturally sensitive, can adjusts communication style to various audiences)Ability to travel to event location specific to each program assignedDemonstrate event planning and event management standard methodologiesExperience working in a dynamic environment and track record of successful execution of multiple events with opposing prioritiesExceptional program, project, and time management skills – highly organized, detail focused, results-driven, accountable with the ability to handle stress and last-minute, urgent requestsDedicated and creative thinker; problem solving and ability to “think and lead on your feet”Consultative approach to questions, concerns and issuesExcellent budgeting, negotiation and vendor management skillsFamiliarity with online and social marketing strategies and tacticsProven experience leading by example (exhibiting integrity, enthusiasm, and commitment to results) and cultivating collaborationWhat are the desired behaviors for this roleAt Arm, we are proud to have a set of behaviors that reflect our unique culture and guide our decisions, defining how we work together to defy ordinary and shape extraordinary. These behaviors are assessed as part of the recruitment process:Delivery of results – You demonstrate a can-do attitude and you drive to overcome obstacles, acting with a sense of urgency because you’re passionate about what you do.Creativity / innovation – Possessing curiosity and a passion for driving continuous improvement through spotting opportunities and seeking the views of others.Collaboration / communication – Your ability to forge lasting relationships which are built upon mutual trust, open communication and sharing of information and success.Personal impact / influence – You listen to different perspectives, evaluate, persuade and carefully shape your work to deliver truly impactful results.Team / personal development – You take time to drive your own development, while also encouraging team members and partners to do the same. #LI-KW1 Benefits Your particular benefits package will depend on position and type of employment and may be subject to change. Your package will be confirmed on offer of employment.
